Introduction
This topic contains information on MOHP for a surviving spouse, including
definition of MOHP for a surviving spouse
general eligibility for MOHP for a surviving spouse
amount of MOHP for a surviving spouse
relationship between MOHP for a surviving spouse and other benefits
dates of entitlement to MOHP for a surviving spouse when the Medal of Honor recipient died on or after January 5, 2021
entitlement to MOHP for a surviving spouse when the Medal of Honor recipient died prior to January 5, 2021
when to pay MOHP for a surviving spouse
retroactive lump-sum payment eligibility for a surviving spouse
amount of lump-sum benefits payable to a surviving spouse
calculating the retroactive lump-sum amount for a surviving spouse
notification to a surviving spouse of a retroactive lump-sum payment
, and
sample development language to determine eligibility for MOHP for a surviving spouse
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 6 - Medal of Honor Pension (MOHP)
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section None
